data.name: Bomb!Bomb!Carnival!! Demo
data.detailed_description:
This game is a third-person sports bombing game where you compete with other players using various bombs.


I want to explode more!

For those of you who are interested You have received an invitation from a sports bombing festival.

What is sports bombing?
It is a sport in which you compete against other players using safe bombs.


The following limitations apply to the demo version.
  • Single-player only
  • Score limit 15

Your score and other saved data can be transferred to the full version.

data.short_description: Third-person sports bombing, where you compete with other players using a variety of bombs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 (64-BIT)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-7700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1070
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 (64-BIT)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-7700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1070
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
